changePropertyValue

public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response changePropertyValue(String pXml)
Dynamically update the value of the property given in XML input file. Also update the property file.

Parameters:
pXml - the xml containing the changes. Xml has to follow that schema: password key value type
Returns:
the changed value if processing was a success. HTTP error code else.
